commit message:
added uses-feature tags to manifest, so that only NFC enabled devices
will see the app in Play Store

* read PIN retry counter
* other small tests and changes
still lot of TODOs

Version 1.2.2 (as published in Google Play)
• New app icon
• added 'Settings' menu
• new setting 'Scan all files'
• added reading the current PIN-retry-counter
• better handling parsing error with QUICK data
